name: The Suffering of Larina
description:
The suffering of Larina is a visual story with choices that affect the ending. Most of the story is told through pictures rather than text. The length of the story is determined by your choices. The story contains sexual content, nudity and violence.

Larina is a Human Elf who wandered into the wrong dungeon, she will suffer the consequences of her unjustified curiosity.

Features:
-Enjoy a slideshow type story with 3D art
-Take full responsibility for your actions and decisions
-Nudity, sexual content and violence


The art was made in 1080p resolution, thus, the text scaling was only optimized for 1080p. Using another resolution may cause problems with text scaling or popping up.
